messages.subject: Greetings all
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there, I am a new member of the list.....i have been a passionate student of Japanese history since i was about 7...i remember the class was doing Japan and
messages.messageBody:
Hi there,

I am a new member of the list.....i have been a passionate student of
Japanese history since i was about 7...i remember the class was doing
Japan and my job was an assignment on the Shogun and samurai...i was
hooked....i am now a high school history teacher myself......in
particular my favourite era is Sengoku Jidai and my personal hero is
Uesegi Kenshin.....i am currently building the armies for 4th
Kawanakajima in miniature and would love to see an osprey campaign
book on this battle.......great to fnd this list and hopefully i can
contribute to our discusion.......

cheers
Jason
